string.value: Marshall refuses to help. What is stopping him? Report the bad news to #bLana#k.
Find the Locker Key Marshall lost and open the #bLocker#k at the subway station. He supposedly lost his Locker Key on the 5th-6th floor of the Shopping Center.
You found the Locker Key #bMarshall#k lost, but the locker closed shortly after you opened it. Try opening the locker one more time.
What? He declined? \r\n#L0##bYes, I think he's going through a tough time.#l\n#k
The rumor I heard must be true, then. Apparently, he can't do anything without the Legendary Scissors.\r\n#L0##bThe Legendary Scissors? What's that? #l\n#k

Ah, a simple trim with those Legendary Scissors could grant you style beyond your imagination! Marshall treasured those scissors and locked them safely away in his locker near the subway station entrance after work. But I hear he's lost his Locker Key. You probably know what I'm hinting at. Want to find the Locker Key for him?

According to the rumor, he lost it while shopping on the 5th and 6th floors of Kerning Square. My guess is that one of the Mannequins picked it up, but no one knows which Mannequin has it. Please hunt Mannequins and find his #bLocker Key#k. When you find it, try opening the locker at the subway station.
Come on, it's an easy task. Think about your friend Blake...
...\r\n#L0##b(This locker is locked tight. It cannot be opened without the key.)#l\n#k
#b(With the quick flick of the key, the locker opened! There is something inside.)#k
Find the #bLocker Key#k and open the locker located at the subway station.
#b(The #bLocker Key#k is needed to open this locker.)#k
